name: Lost Mind
description:
Lost mind is a 2D Horror Game where you head deeper and deeper into the forest to find your lost friend. However, your mind makes you hallucinate, making it difficult to complete your task.

This project was created by a team of 2 for the Ludum Dare 48 on the theme of 'Deeper and Deeper'.

Game Programmer and Developer: https://aliazeem.itch.io/
Sound Designer: https://itch.io/profile/mercenary-tao

Honorable mentions:
Helped a bit with the art: https://itch.io/profile/atorito
